DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Abdominal Pelvic Ultrasound Imaging Performed Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to a diagnostic evaluation that uses sound waves (called ultrasound) to produce a visual images of organs or tissues of the abdomen, the part of the body between the chest and the hips that contains the pancreas, stomach, intestines, liver, gallbladder, and other organs, or the pelvis, the lower part of the abdomen located between the hip bones.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Abdominal Pelvic Ultrasound Imaging Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a diagnostic evaluation that uses sound waves (called ultrasound) to produce a visual images of organs or tissues of the abdomen, the part of the body between the chest and the hips that contains the pancreas, stomach, intestines, liver, gallbladder, and other organs, or the pelvis, the lower part of the abdomen located between the hip bones.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of, or related to, the abdomen.:Of or pertaining to the pelvis.:A technique in which high-frequency sound waves are bounced off internal organs and the echo pattern is converted into a 2 dimensional picture of the structures beneath the transducer.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Of, or related to, the abdomen.
Of or pertaining to the pelvis.
The use of high-frequency sound waves to generate images of the body.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the specified free-text field related to an aspect of patient/participant's diagnosis

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
